tasks.title: Usability Testing
tasks.description: Conduct usability testing sessions with representative users to evaluate the effectiveness and ease of use of the prototypes. Gather feedback on user experience and identify areas for improvement.

tasks.title: Refinement and Iteration
tasks.description: Based on the feedback received from usability testing, refine and iterate on the prototypes. Make necessary adjustments and enhancements to address user concerns and improve the overall design.

tasks.title: Finalize Solution Design
tasks.description: Finalize the design of the solution based on the refined prototypes and user feedback. Ensure that the solution aligns with project goals, stakeholder requirements, and usability standards.

tasks.title: Implementation and Development
tasks.description: Begin the implementation and development phase of the project. Transform the finalized design into a functional solution, leveraging appropriate technologies and methodologies.

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Thoroughly test the developed solution to identify and fix any bugs, errors, or functional issues. Perform quality assurance checks to ensure the solution meets the required standards and specifications.
